definition: a professional killer who uses a gun, shoot with a gun
details:
noun
- a professional killer who uses a gun
= synonyms: torpedo, shooter, gunman, gunslinger, hired gun, gun for hire, triggerman, hit man, hitman
- a person who shoots a gun (as regards their ability)
= synonyms: gunman
- the discharge of a firearm as signal or as a salute in military ceremonies
= example: the discharge of a firearm as signal or as a salute in military ceremonies
- a pedal that controls the throttle valve
= synonyms: accelerator, throttle, accelerator pedal, gas pedal, gas
- large but transportable armament
= synonyms: artillery, heavy weapon, ordnance
- a hand-operated pump that resembles a revolver
= synonyms: grease-gun
- a weapon that discharges a missile at high velocity (especially from a metal tube or barrel)
verb
- shoot with a gun
